arabic: إِنَّمَا الْأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ، وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى
translation: Actions are judged by intentions, and everyone will get what they intended

arabic: مَن كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ فَلْيَقُلْ خَيْرًا أَوْ لِيَصْمُتْ
translation: Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should speak good or remain silent

arabic: الْمُسْلِمُ مَنْ سَلِمَ الْمُسْلِمُونَ مِنْ لِسَانِهِ وَيَدِهِ
translation: The Muslim is the one from whose tongue and hand the Muslims are safe

arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لِأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ
translation: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself
Whoever prays the two cool prayers (Fajr and Asr) will enter Paradise
The best among you are those who learn the Quran and teach it
